---
category: news
title: "MIT Announces AI Benchmark ThreeDWorld Transport Challenge"
excerpt: "A team of researchers from MIT and the MIT-IBM Watson AI Lab have announced the ThreeDWorld Transport Challenge, a benchmark task for embodied AI agents. The challenge is to improve research on AI agents that can control a simulated mobile robot that is guided by computer vision to pick up objects and move them to new locations."
